QuoteItemTaxItem.name: QuoteItemTaxItem
QuoteItemTaxItem.description: The tax that is applied to a quote line item.

Amount.description: The tax amount for the quote line item.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the org.

Description.description: User-defined description of the tax. For example, state sales tax or value-added tax (VAT).

QuoteLineItemId.description: ID of the related quote line item.

Rate.description: If the tax is a percentage tax, then this field contains the percent value. If the tax is a fixed amount, then this field is null.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: The date used to calculate the tax rate.

Type.description: Whether the tax is estimated or calculated by the tax provider.
